author: rineholt
msg: This should remove the automatic prefixing of "cid:" for the Content-Id headers.
I think to be honest that we transmitted this in the MIME headers on the wire which was
incorrect and this also fixes that too.  However, I accepted code in the past that
i'm sure broke the logic for finding attachments by Content-Location :-(.
Need to revisted that as soon as I get more spare bandwidth.

author: scheu
msg: Problem: Serialization was sending xsi:type even though RPCParam.setXSITypeGeneration(false)
Solution:The serializer was resetting sendType to true when a serializer was not found.
It should only reset sendType if a serializer is not found and a preferred type was specified.

author: stevel
msg: pulled the check for server-deploy.wsdd as it is not on the classpath; we need an alternate search mechanism
